# PoseJointName

**Associated Type**

A type that represents a joint name.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype PoseJointName : Decodable, Encodable, Hashable, RawRepresentable where Self.PoseJointName.RawValue == String
```

## Getting the joint names

- **availableJointNames**: The names of the available joints in the observation.

items.description: The names of the available joints in the observation.
